languages.text: "Тяжким трудом и нерушимым духом верные слуги Его питают сотни миров Империума. Вся их жизнь — пример истинного служения Человечеству".
"By their arduous labour and unbreakable spirit do His faithful servants fuel hundreds of Imperial worlds. Their entire lives are an example of true service to Humanity."
languages.original_text: "Тяжким трудом и нерушимым духом верные слуги Его питают сотни миров Империума. Вся их жизнь — пример истинного служения Человечеству".

traits.locale_text: "By their arduous labour and unbreakable spirit do His faithful servants fuel hundreds of Imperial worlds. Their entire lives are an example of true service to Humanity."
"By their arduous labour and unbreakable spirit do His faithful servants fuel hundreds of Imperial worlds. Their entire lives are an example of true service to Humanity."
"By their arduous labour and unbreakable spirit do His faithful servants fuel hundreds of Imperial worlds. Their entire lives are an example of true service to Humanity."
"By their arduous labour and unbreakable spirit do His faithful servants fuel hundreds of Imperial worlds. Their entire lives are an example of true service to Humanity."

languages.text: « Le travail acharné et la volonté inébranlable de ces serviteurs dévoués alimentent en carburant des centaines de mondes impériaux. Leurs vies entières sont un exemple de sacrifice au service de l'humanité. »
languages.original_text: "By their arduous labour and unbreakable spirit do His faithful servants fuel hundreds of Imperial worlds. Their entire lives are an example of true service to Humanity."

traits.locale_text: « Le travail acharné et la volonté inébranlable de ces serviteurs dévoués alimentent en carburant des centaines de mondes impériaux. Leurs vies entières sont un exemple de sacrifice au service de l'humanité. »

languages.text: “神皇忠诚的仆人通过艰苦朴素的劳动与坚如磐石的意志，为数以百计的帝国世界提供燃料。他们的一生是为人类服务的榜样。”
languages.original_text: "By their arduous labour and unbreakable spirit do His faithful servants fuel hundreds of Imperial worlds. Their entire lives are an example of true service to Humanity."

traits.locale_text: “神皇忠诚的仆人通过艰苦朴素的劳动与坚如磐石的意志，为数以百计的帝国世界提供燃料。他们的一生是为人类服务的榜样。”

languages.text: 「主の忠実なしもべたちは、その困難な労働と折れることのない精神によって、何百ものインペリアルワールドに燃料を供給している。彼らの全生涯は、人類への真の奉仕の模範となるものなんだ」
languages.original_text: "By their arduous labour and unbreakable spirit do His faithful servants fuel hundreds of Imperial worlds. Their entire lives are an example of true service to Humanity."

traits.locale_text: 「主の忠実なしもべたちは、その困難な労働と折れることのない精神によって、何百ものインペリアルワールドに燃料を供給している。彼らの全生涯は、人類への真の奉仕の模範となるものなんだ」

languages.text: "Durch ihre harte Arbeit und ihren unbezwingbaren Willen versorgen seine treuen Diener hunderte von imperialen Welten mit Energie. Ihr gesamtes Leben ist ein leuchtendes Beispiel für wahren Dienst an der Menschheit."
languages.original_text: "By their arduous labour and unbreakable spirit do His faithful servants fuel hundreds of Imperial worlds. Their entire lives are an example of true service to Humanity."

traits.locale_text: "Durch ihre harte Arbeit und ihren unbezwingbaren Willen versorgen seine treuen Diener hunderte von imperialen Welten mit Energie. Ihr gesamtes Leben ist ein leuchtendes Beispiel für wahren Dienst an der Menschheit."

languages.text: «Los fieles siervos del Emperador alimentan cientos de mundos mediante su arduo trabajo y su espíritu inquebrantable. Sus vidas enteras son un ejemplo de servicio a la Humanidad».
languages.original_text: "By their arduous labour and unbreakable spirit do His faithful servants fuel hundreds of Imperial worlds. Their entire lives are an example of true service to Humanity."

traits.locale_text: «Los fieles siervos del Emperador alimentan cientos de mundos mediante su arduo trabajo y su espíritu inquebrantable. Sus vidas enteras son un ejemplo de servicio a la Humanidad».

languages.text: "Zorlu çalışmaları ve sarsılmaz ruhlarıyla O'nun sadık hizmetkârları, yüzlerce İmparatorluk dünyasını besliyor. Hayatlarının tamamı, İnsanlığa gerçek hizmetin bir örneği."
languages.original_text: "By their arduous labour and unbreakable spirit do His faithful servants fuel hundreds of Imperial worlds. Their entire lives are an example of true service to Humanity."
